Name: Spartoi Meadow
About the game: Main features ARPG where you explore the area, defeat the boss, and aim for the next area. Find warpable checkpoints to make your adventure easier. You'll be able to see through the enemy's actions, level up, get better equipment, and defeat the enemies that stand in your way! If you feel that the battle is not going well, take a look at the situation. Guard, which completely prevents damage, activates when you're not doing anything. It also activates while walking or dashing. [Those who might enjoy this game] Those who like hunting action and fighting game boss battles. Those who like to avoid or deal with attacks without using invincible moves. Those who like to observe and make predictions.
